file_content.text: You three have nominated yourselves to lead my fleet?
How you feeling now, tough guy?
Better than you might think...
I am Trizz'mal the Merciless. My ship is the terror of the skies on twenty planets.
The Republic calls me Iceheart, for I have never shown mercy.
I am Lunatta. Imperial Intelligence marked me their "most wanted," for the thousands I slew on Csilla.
Did I ask for your credentials? What do I care if you want to get yourselves shot first?
That's always been your problem, Voidy--can I call you Voidy? You never worry about the big picture.
That's short-sighted.
Are you offering to captain my fleet instead?
The Republic knows you're coming. Stand down, or your fleet will be destroyed.
Call them off.
"The Republic knows..."? What does that matter until they have the guts or the guns to do something about it.
Who is this?
That's her. The one who got Rogun and Nok Drayen.
That's him. The one who found Nok Drayen.
Leave. You know your orders. This is private business between the captain and me.
The Voidwolf doesn't care if you die in this attack. You want to be around for the long haul, you're better off with me.
Work for me.
When I came to you, they were saying no one in the galaxy could challenge your command. Were they wrong?
I smell a fight.
And this fleet belongs to whoever's standing at the end.
You picked the wrong side. How hard do you want it to be to back out once he's dead?
Back down.
If he's dead, I have no reason to be a part of this.
Perhaps.
I'll work for whoever's left standing.
Bare your throat now, cub. Or prepare to have it torn out!
As soon as he's dead, I'm coming after you.
Your turn. [Attack Voidwolf]
This ends here!
It's over! [Attack Voidwolf]
